content: आलंब {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Hanging down. --बः {@--1@} Depending on or from. {@--2@} That on which one rests or leans, prop, stay; इह हि पततां नास्त्यालंबो न चापि निवर्तनं <ls>Śānti. 3. 2.</ls> {@--3@} Support, protection; तवालंबादंव स्फुरदलघुगर्वेण सहसा <ls>Jag.</ls>; सीतां शून्ये यथासुखं निरालंबां हरिष्यामि <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--4@} Receptacle. {@--5@} A perpendicular. --बा <ab>N.</ab> of a plant with poisonous leaves.
